items.name: PancakeSwap
items.des: Pancakeswap is an advanced decentralized platform built on BSC for users to trade, earn, and win cryptocurrencies freely.

items.name: Uniswap
items.des: Uniswap is a DeFi protocol for exchanging cryptocurrencies. Through its smart contracts, cryptocurrency trading on the Ethereum blockchain can be facilitated automatically.

items.name: W3Swap
items.des: Building an adaptive trading ecosystem with high liquidity to bring disruptive innovations to the Web3.0 world.
